group_1.narration: Well, I'm not sure if it's good enough@to be called "an idea," but...

group_1.textRight: Maybe "color" would add some Christmas@flair... What do you think?
Some colors go hand-in-hand with Christmas@things, right?
Like Santa's red and white or...

Just can't let the tree thing go, huh?@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]But, yes, that's what I'm talking about!
If we could have a table full of Christmasy@colors, then...
That could be the Christmas menu! ...[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]Or, at@least I think it would work.
Yes, because it's red... Sorry. I wish there@were more to it!

group_1.textLeft: Thinking of all those colors on the table's@getting me excited!
Giving the food a color theme will make it@really feel like a party!
All right! Thanks a bunch for the advice!

group_1.textRight: I, um, didn't do that much...

group_1.textLeft: I'll whip up the best Christmas Chinese@food dinner you've ever seen!

group_1.textRight: Are you sure you don't need help?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100350:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I got this, so sit back and wait!@Yep yep yep!

group_1.narration: And so, Tsuruno started making@the food with everything she had...
But, is she okay on her own?
I wonder if Yachiyo needs any help?

group_1.textCenter: (Oops... I didn't mean to chuckle like @that...)

group_1.narration: <In reality, the one secretly most excited@about the Christmas party was Yachiyo...>
